attributes.action: Make first aid and cpr part of the national curriculum
attributes.additional_details: I think that in light of recent events in the euros and society the way it has become first aid could help prevent deaths and aid those whom we see injured
attributes.background: To add first aid and cpr to the nation curriculum for all children in the UK with refresher lessons throughout school

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: 

Add CPR, Basic Life Support and Defib Training to National Curriculum for 14+:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584705
